verses.verse: I will sing <S%H7891><s%> of loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> and justice. <S%H4941><s%> To you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, I will sing praises. <S%H2167><s%>

I will be careful <S%H7919><s%> to live a blameless <S%H8549><s%> life. <S%H1870><s%> When will you come <S%H935><s%> to me? <S%H1980><s%> I will walk within <S%H7130><s%> my house <S%H1004><s%> with a blameless <S%H8537><s%> heart. <S%H3824><s%>

I will set <S%H7896><s%> no vile <S%H1100><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> before my eyes. <S%H5869><s%> I hate <S%H8130><s%> the deeds <S%H6213><s%> of faithless <S%H7750><s%> men. <S%H1692><s%> They will not cling to me.
A perverse <S%H6141><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> will be far <S%H5493><s%> from me. <S%H3045><s%> I will have nothing to do with evil. <S%H7451><s%>

I will silence <S%H6789><s%> whoever secretly <S%H5643><s%> slanders <S%H3960><s%> his neighbor. <S%H7453><s%> I won't <S%H3201><s%> tolerate one who is <S%H5869><s%> haughty <S%H1362><s%> and <S%H3824><s%> conceited. <S%H7342><s%>

My eyes <S%H5869><s%> will be on the faithful <S%H539><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> that they may dwell <S%H3427><s%> with me. <S%H1980><s%> He who walks in a perfect <S%H8549><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> he will serve me. <S%H8334><s%>

He who practices <S%H6213><s%> deceit <S%H7423><s%> won't <S%H3427><s%> dwell within <S%H7130><s%> my house. <S%H1004><s%> He who speaks <S%H1696><s%> falsehood <S%H8267><s%> won't <S%H3559><s%> be established before my eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

Morning <S%H1242><s%> by morning, <S%H6789><s%> I will destroy all the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of the land; <S%H776><s%> to cut off <S%H3772><s%> all the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%> from Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s city. <S%H5892><s%>
